comments.text:
This kid is overdoing it, but so are these morons. Take the chick-fil-a 
thing for example. Chick-Fil-A does not hate gays. Chick-Fil-A does not 
condone a mass gathering of homosexuals performing what could be considered 
homosexual acts on their property. That being said, a lesbian can go to 
chick-fil-a, work there, eat there, whatever. Nothing wrong with that. It's 
the "gay pride" thing that makes people not like being around homosexuals. 
I'm a straight male, and a good friend of mine is gay. He doesn't make a 
big deal of "gay pride", and we've actually gone to chick-fil-a before. 
Wow. What a concept. Mind blown. But seriously, look at the statistics. The 
kid does have a point that more kids are claiming to be gay (even though 
many of them renounce it later, but the mainstream media doesn't tell you 
that) because they are encouraged to say that by media and government. ﻿
